General.Name: Beijing Jingyuntong Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Jingyuntong Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of photovoltaic (PV) and semiconductor equipment in China and internationally. Its products include mono-crystal growers, multi-crystalline directional solidification growers, and float-zone furnace. The company also provides PV material products, such as mono and multi crystal ingots and wafers, as well as PV and wind power generation stations, and honeycomb medium and low temperature SCR flue gas denitrification catalyst. Beijing Jingyuntong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
